attributes.action: Give back all the extremists their passports to be deported out of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This has been recently on national television all we want is our country to be safe! For this to happen we need to reach the amount of signatures for this to be reviewed in the parliament! 

Let's be confident and work together to make this country safe! 

Extremists are Muslims they are a cover for terrorists!
attributes.background:
this past year has been a roller coaster for the whole world! Including England, Syria etc.. 

At the moment their are extremists in England and we want the British government to give them back their passports as they have requested and the British public have agreed to this!

rejection.details:
The Government already has the power to deport people when the Home Secretary has decided that their removal from the country is 'conducive to the public good'.

You can read more about the Government’s guidance on deportation here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/426906/Deport-non_eea_Foreign_Nationals.pdf
